title: The exhibition “Yerevan of love” in the Yerevan Modern Art Museum (Yerevan Municipality)
text: ( Source : Yerevan Municipality ) 10.10. 2015 Within the frames of 'Erebuni-Yerevan 2797' celebration the exhibition ' Yerevan of love' is open in Yerevan Modern Art Museum . With the experimentalism typical for modern thinking the Modern Art
